ProductInfo.Features:
See sports, video games and high-speed action with virtually no motion blur and in crystal clarity with LG's TruMotion 120Hz technology
With almost double the pixel resolution, Full HD 1080p gives it superior picture quality over standard HDTV
Wireless 1080p Connectivity lets you cut loose from messy wires and still get a stunning Full HD picture anywhere you put the TV
The Intelligent Sensor automatically optimizes the picture to the lighting conditions in the room for a personalized and enjoyable viewing experience.
ProductInfo.Name: 47LH85 47" 1080p Wireless Full HD LCD TV with TruMotion 120Hz & Intelligent
